origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'OptionMarket.get_transaction_cost_analysis', 'description': 'Get the latest transaction cost analysis report for options market', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'query for the latest report'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'the latest transaction cost analysis report'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一家制造公司的风险管理经理，我们希望通过期权对冲原材料价格风险。首先，我需要获取最新的期权市场交易成本分析报告。然后，我需要获取主要原材料期权的交易费用数据。接着，分析这些费用对期权交易的影响。最后，基于分析结果，推荐适合的期权交易策略。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的期权市场交易成本分析报告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'report': 'The latest transaction cost analysis report for the options market indicates that the average cost per transaction has increased by 5% over the past quarter due to increased market volatility and higher demand for options trading.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'report': 'The latest transaction cost analysis report for the options market indicates that the average cost per transaction has increased by 5% over the past quarter due to increased market volatility and higher demand for options trading.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取主要原材料期权的交易费用数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'report': 'The transaction costs for raw materials options have shown a significant increase, with the cost per contract rising by 7% for oil options, 6% for gold options, and 5% for copper options.'}

请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
